acceptanceCheck.title: Are you in the right place?

Our offers are aimed at educationally disadvantaged students and apprentices.
Which statements apply to you?
acceptanceCheck.familyCannotHelp: My family cannot help me with schoolwork
acceptanceCheck.familyCannotAffordTutoring: My family cannot afford tutoring for me
acceptanceCheck.doNotApplyToMe: None of these two points apply to me

acceptanceCheckFailed.title: What a pity.

userName.congratsHint:
Wonderful.
You can use our free offers.
userName.title: What is your name?

userAge.title: How old are you?
userAge.tooYoungError: {{minAge}} years is the minimum age for which we can offer free tutoring.
userAge.descriptionPupil: The minimum age is 7. If you are under 18, your parents must give their consent later.
userAge.descriptionStudent: The minimum age is 14 years. If you are under 18, we will later need the consent of a legal representative (e.g. parent)

languages.titlePupil: What languages do you speak at home?
languages.titleStudent: Which languages do you speak fluently?
languages.descriptionPupil: We try to bring you together with volunteers who speak similar languages.
languages.descriptionStudent: We try to bring you together with pupils who speak similar languages.

bookAppointment.title: Introductory Meeting

faqPupil.question: Do I have to turn on my camera?
faqPupil.answer: No, only if you want to.

faqPupil.question: How long does the meeting last?
Who will be there?
faqPupil.answer: One person from Lern-Fair. You can also bring your parents. Or another person who helps you.

faqPupil.question: Why is this necessary?
faqPupil.answer: So we understand which subjects you’d like help in and can find suitable offers for you.

faqPupil.question: Which language will be spoken?
faqPupil.answer: Mostly German, but we can also speak English or other languages. If you don’t speak German well, just write us an email and we’ll find a solution.

faqStudent.question: How long does the meeting last?
What commitments am I making?
faqStudent.answer: We'll start with a non-binding discussion to find out together how you can best get involved. There is no obligation for you to get started immediately.

faqStudent.question: What do I need to bring with me?
faqStudent.answer: Please have an identification document with your address ready (e.g. identity card, residence certificate or registration certificate).

faqStudent.question: Do I have to switch on my camera?
faqStudent.answer: Only if we carry out the ID check.

faqStudent.question: Do I need to prepare for the interview?
faqStudent.answer: No, but if you’d like, you can already take a look at our offers <clarificationVideo>(here you’ll find an explainer video)</clarificationVideo>

faqStudent.question: How long does the interview take?
What language is spoken?
faqStudent.answer: Tutoring is usually provided in German, as our services are aimed at pupils in the German school system. We therefore also conduct the introductory meeting in German. This allows us to see together whether the language level is suitable.

bookAppointment.descriptionPupil: In a short, friendly video call (15 minutes) we would like to get to know you a little. This will help us find the right help for you. You don't have to prepare anything.
bookAppointment.descriptionStudent:
In a short, friendly video call
(approx. 30 minutes) we would like to get to know you a little.
bookAppointment.messagePupil: "You can ask us anything - we're here for you."
bookAppointment.messageStudent:
"We will answer all your questions and
discuss the engagement opportunities."

emailOwner.title: Which email address should we use?
emailOwner.description: We’ll send all the starting information to this email address. You can change it later.

authenticationInfo.title: Register for free
authenticationInfo.descriptionPupil: With this user account, you can attend group courses, 1:1 tutoring and homework help free of charge.
authenticationInfo.descriptionStudent: With your user account, you have access to your learning pairs, can chat with learning partners and create lectures for you.

dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy Consent
dataPrivacy.dataUsageInfoLabel: This is what happens with your data when you register with Lern-Fair:
dataPrivacy.dataUsageUSA: Data processing by processors in the USA
dataPrivacy.labelTermsAndPrivacy: I have read the <privacy>privacy policy</privacy> and <agb>terms and conditions</agb>.

usageBullets.1: We store your data as long as your account at Lern-Fair is active and delete it at the latest 3 years after deactivation.
usageBullets.2: We share information about you (name, school type, grade, federal state, subjects) with helpers who will support you.
usageBullets.3: We use services from Heroku, Mailjet, Datadog, and Google to process your data, which may not guarantee the European data protection level.

dataPrivacy.accordionUsDataProcessors: I acknowledge that the processing of my personal data takes place via our processors Google and Heroku located in the USA, which cannot guarantee compliance with the European data protection level due to possible requests from US intelligence services. For this purpose, Lern-Fair has concluded standard contractual clauses and agreed on additional security measures, Art. 46 para. 2 lit. c GDPR.

confirmEmail.title: Please confirm your email
confirmEmail.description: We have sent a message to {{email}} The message contains a link. With this link, you can activate your account. Also check your spam folder – sometimes the message ends up there.

appointmentDetails.title: Appointment created!
appointmentDetails.description: There are just a few last steps. Then we can really get started.

registrationCompleted.title: You did it!
registrationCompleted.description: We look forward to the introductory meeting with you via Zoom on

screeningInProgress.title: You’ll hear from us soon!
screeningInProgress.description: Normally it takes about a week...

school.title:
Which school
do you attend?
school.helperText: Can’t find your school in the list? Then just enter the name and location of your school.

zipCode.title: What is your postal code?
zipCode.descriptionPupil: The zip code shows us which area you are registering from. Your zip code remains secret. The helpers will not see it.
zipCode.descriptionStudent: We never pass this information on to pupils . Your zip code helps us with the internal evaluation.

notifications.title: Set email notifications
notifications.description: How would you like to be informed – by email and app? You can change this later.
notifications.importantInformationDescription: I want to receive messages when it’s important. For example: a new appointment or a new chat message.
notifications.recommendationsDescription: I also want to receive information about new offers and tips.

ourRules.title: Our Rules
ourRules.description: Our helpers support you in their free time ☺️
rules: 🔋 Respect the time and energy of the helpers.
⌚ Be punctual and keep your appointments.
❌ No discrimination. That means no insults. No racism. No sexism. Respect all religions and all ages.
ourRules.acceptLabel: I agree to follow the rules.

state.title: School Location
state.subtitle: Where do you go to school?
state.weightingNote: We only consider the school location as an optional factor when matching you with a learning partner. Depending on availability, your future learning partner may come from another region.

resend.successAlert: We have resent you the confirmation email. Please check your inbox and also check your spam.

usageBullets.1: We store your data for as long as your account at Lern-Fair is active and delete it no later than 3 years after your account is deactivated
usageBullets.2: We share your personal information (name, school type, grade, state, subjects) with volunteers who will support you
usageBullets.3: We use offers from Heroku, Mailjet, Datadog and Google to process your data, which may not be able to guarantee the European level of data protection

accordionUsDataProcessors.title: Data processing by processors in the USA
accordionUsDataProcessors.body: I acknowledge that the processing of my personal data is carried out by our US-based processors Google and Heroku, which cannot guarantee compliance with the European level of data protection due to the possibility of requests from US intelligence services. For this purpose, Lern-Fair has concluded standard contractual clauses and agreed further security measures, Art. 46 para. 2 lit. c GDPR.

legal.whatHappensWithData: This is what happens to your data when you register at Lern-Fair :
legal.accept: I have taken note of the data protection regulations:
legal.noInvestigation: I declare that I have not been convicted of a criminal offense as defined in § 72a para. 1 sentence 1 SGB VII and that there are currently no preliminary proceedings against me for such an offense.
legal.newsletterAgreement: I would like to receive information about offers, promotions and other support opportunities from Lern-Fair by email.
legal.underageDisclaimer: Note: In the event that the person giving consent has not yet reached the age of 18, the holder of parental responsibility for the person must give their consent.

popup.content: You can also restart the tour at any time. You will find the point in the help area under "Onboarding".

welcome.title: Welcome to Lern-Fair
welcome.content: We are pleased that you are taking advantage of our offer.
welcome.question: Would you like to see what our platform has to offer?
welcome.answer: We show you the most important functions.

matching.title: Learning support
matching.content: If you need one-to-one help, then learning support is the right thing for you. You will receive a:n fixed:n volunteer from us.

groupCourse.title: Tutoring courses
groupCourse.content: There is help on various topics in small groups.

appointments.title: My lectures
appointments.content: Here you will find an overview of your planned lectures.

helpCenter.title: Help area
helpCenter.content: Here you will find frequently asked questions and their answers. You can also contact us here

profile.title: Profile
profile.content: You can change the subjects in which you need help in your profile.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content: In this section you can make general changes and changes to your account (email address, password). You will also find legal information on using the platform here.

notification.title: Notification
notification.content: You will be informed about news about your matching, new contacts and general topics. You can see if you have any new messages by clicking on the bell at the top right.

finisher.title: Done!
finisher.content: Just a moment, your personal dashboard will load.

popup.title: Are you sure you want to skip the tour?
popup.content: You can also restart the tour at any time. You will find the item under your settings as "Onboarding tour".

welcome.title: Welcome to Lern-Fair
welcome.content: We are delighted that you would like to actively support educationally disadvantaged children.
welcome.question: Would you like to see what our platform has to offer?
welcome.answer: We show you the most important functions.

matching.title: Learning support
matching.content: Learning support is 1:1 support for pupils who need individual help. Here you can find your lectures, your learning partners, see your requested matches and request new matches.

groupCourse.title: Group courses
groupCourse.content: Group courses offer short-term support for specific problems and questions. All your group courses are displayed under "My courses". You can also create new courses here.

appointment.title: Lectures
appointment.content: Under "My Lectures" you will see all your lectures, arranged in tabs and sorted by date.

helpCenter.title: Help area
helpCenter.content: If you need help, you can find the most important information in our help section.

profile.title: Profile
profile.content: You can enter all relevant data in your profile.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content: In this section you can make general changes and changes to your account (email address, password). You will also find legal information on using the platform here.

notification.title: Notification
notification.content: You will be informed about news about your matching, new contacts and general topics. You can see if you have any new messages by clicking on the bell at the top right.

finisher.title: Done!
finisher.content: Just a moment, your personal dashboard will load.

popup.title: Are you sure you want to skip the tour?
popup.content: You can also restart the tour at any time. You will find the item under your settings as "Onboarding tour".

welcome.title: Onboarding tour Learning support
welcome.content: Here we show you all the important information you need to know about learning support.
welcome.question: How do I request a learning partner? How do I get in touch with my learning partner? How can I break up a learning pair?
welcome.answer: We show you the most important functions.

matching.title: Request learning partner
matching.content: You can request a new learning partner via the "Request learning partner" button on the dashboard or in the Individual section.

request.title: Make a request
request.content: So that we can assign you a learning partner, we need some information about you and your offer.

match.title: Allocation of the learning pair
match.content: After you have submitted your request, we will start looking for a suitable learning partner for you.
match.contentsec: You can also cancel your request at any time. All your requests are listed under Requests in the Single section.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.content: If you have been matched, you can contact your learning partner directly via the "Contact us" button in the notification.
contact.contentsec: If you would like to contact your learning partner at a later date, you can also do this via your learning partner's profile.

matchSolve.title: Dissolve learning pair
matchSolve.content: If you would like to dissolve the learning partnership with a learning partner, you can do so under "Individuals" under "Learning partners" by clicking the "Dissolve learning pair" button.

finisher.title: Done
finisher.firstContent: Congratulations, you have completed the onboarding tour for learning support.
finisher.answer: You can watch the tour again and take a look at our help section. Here you will find the most important information and assistance for you as volunteer.

welcome.title: Ethical standards
welcome.content: This ethics guide provides an overview of the minimum requirements for responsible conduct at Lern-Fair and encourages self-critical reflection when dealing with pupils . Please read the following points carefully and observe them in your work.

screen1.title: Interpersonal interaction
screen1.content1: At Lern-Fair , reliability, respect and appreciation take center stage. Every person is accepted as an equal regardless of age, gender, origin, culture, status, orientation, ideology or religion.
screen1.content2: I respect different political and religious views and avoid influencing learners in a particular direction. At the same time, I stand by our laws and democratic values and am committed to tolerance and against discrimination.

screen2.title: Security
screen2.content1: The well-being of minors is my top priority. I always keep my distance, respect personal boundaries and the privacy of pupils to create a safe and trusting environment. In case of suspected neglect or violence, our website offers counseling services.
screen2.content2: All data and information must be treated confidentially. Personal data may not be passed on, not even in private. Access data and video chat links are not shared with third parties.

screen3.title: Code of conduct
screen3.content1: I assess my workload realistically and adjust my workload if it is too much. The Lern-Fair team is there to support me.
screen3.content2: The cooperation is voluntary and can be terminated, adapted or changed at any time.

screen4.title: Pedagogical and professional competence
screen4.content1: I consciously reflect on my actions and my professional and media skills in order to provide the best possible support for pupils . If necessary, I look for tips and educational support from the user area.
screen4.content2: I communicate clearly about the nature and scope of my support. If I am unable to provide this for time, professional or other reasons, I will inform pupils in good time.

screen5.title: Dealing with inquiries, complaints and violations
screen5.content1: The Executive Board of Lern-Fair e.V. decides on measures to be taken in the event of breaches of the ethics guidelines. In certain cases, this may mean exclusion from the project, which will be communicated with a reason. Inquiries, complaints or reports of violations can be sent by email to support@lern-fair.de.
screen5.checkboxText: I have read the ethics guidelines carefully and agree to them.

onboardingList.title: Onboarding
onboardingList.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod

offers.noMatching: You don't have an active learning pair right now
offers.waitingTimeInfo: Please note that there may be longer waiting times when looking for a learning partner. In the meantime, you can also take advantage of our courses or homework help.

supportCategories.daz: German as a second or foreign language

contents.recommendFriends: Do you support Lern-Fair 's mission for more educational equality in Germany? Then tell your friends about Lern-Fair and let's help even more disadvantaged children and young people together.
contents.recommendText: Hey, I volunteer at Lern-Fair e.V. for more educational opportunities and justice in Germany. Maybe that would be something for you too? It's really easy and completely flexible, as everything takes place online and you can take part from home. I would be delighted if you were there! You can find all the information on the website: www.lern-fair.de

homeworkhelp.title: Homework help
homeworkhelp.catcher: Do you need help with your homework?
homeworkhelp.catcherHelper: Would you like to help students with their homework?
homeworkhelp.text: Every day from Monday - Thursday 17h - 18h we offer homework help on Zoom. You can participate every day if you need help with your homework.

verifizierung.subtitle: Verification
verifizierung.title: Verify your email address
verifizierung.content: "Before you can start at Lern-Fair , you must first confirm your email address. We sent you an email to {{email}} on {{date}}. You haven't received an email from us?"

passwort.subtitle: password
passwort.title: Set up password
passwort.content: The time has finally come, we are changing our login system! You can now assign a password for your Lern-Fair account and use it to log in in future.

willkommen.title: Welcome 👋
willkommen.subtitle: Nice to have you here!
willkommen.content: We look forward to welcoming you to Lern-Fair ! We offer tutoring courses on various subjects such as German, math and English. If you need individual help, you can also join our waiting list for learning support

statusSchüler.title: You are on the waiting list!
statusSchüler.subtitle: Waiting list
statusSchüler.content: As soon as it is your turn, we will inform you by email. Your request was made on {{date}}. In the meantime, you can take part in our group courses.

interestconfirmation.title: Do you still need support?
interestconfirmation.subtitle: Support
interestconfirmation.content: Du bist nun oben auf unserer Warteliste und wir können dich bald mit einem:r Lernpartner:in verbinden. Brauchst du immer noch Hilfe in den Fächern {{subjectSchüler}}. Wenn du “Nein” klickst oder dich nicht innerhalb von 14 Tagen bei uns meldest, vergeben wir deinen Platz an andere Schüler:innen.

kontaktSchüler.subtitle: 1:1 learning support
kontaktSchüler.title: New learning partners
kontaktSchüler.content: Es ist endlich so weit, wir haben eine:n Lernpartner:in für dich gefunden! {{nameHelfer}} kann dich ab sofort in {{subjectHelfer}} unterstützen. Bitte nehme Kontakt mit {{nameHelfer}} auf und vereinbare ein erstes Treffen.

angeforderteBescheinigung.title: Confirmation
angeforderteBescheinigung.subtitle: Tutoring with {{nameHelfer}}
angeforderteBescheinigung.content: {{nameHelfer}} has asked us for a certificate for your learning support. Only if you confirm this can we fulfill {{nameHelfer}}'s request.

kennenlernen.subtitle: Get to know
kennenlernen.title: We want to get to know you 👋!
kennenlernen.content: Before you can start with us, we would like to get to know you in a 15-minute video conference call. Simply arrange a lecture with us.

buttons: Information on the certificate of good conduct
zeugnis.subtitle: Important!
zeugnis.title: Extended certificate of good conduct
zeugnis.content: Wie im Kennenlerngespräch erläutert, brauchen wir von dir ein erweitertes Führungszeugnis, welches du unter Vorlage des Vordrucks kostenlos vor Ort oder online beantragen kannst. Du kannst dennoch sofort mit deinem Engagement bei uns beginnen und Schüler:innen unterstützen. Frist für die Einreichung: {{cocDate}}
zeugnis.actionDescription: Everything about the certificate of good conduct

statusStudent.subtitle: 1:1 learning support
statusStudent.title: We are looking for a learning partner for you!
statusStudent.content: Thank you for wanting to support a:n pupil at Lern-Fair ! We will put you in touch with someone who:r matches the subjects or year groups you have specified. We will usually get back to you by email within a week with a:r suitable pupil.

buttons: Another learning pair is formed by
statusStudent2.subtitle: Further engagement opportunities
statusStudent2.title: Fancy more?
statusStudent2.content: Would you like to support more pupils ? Offer a group course or further learning partnerships.

kontaktStudent.title: New learning partners
kontaktStudent.subtitle: 1:1 learning support
kontaktStudent.content: Es ist soweit, wir haben eine:n Schüler:in für dich gefunden! {{nameSchüler}} freut sich schon sehr auf deine Unterstützung. Bitte nehme Kontakt mit {{nameSchüler}} auf und vereinbare ein erstes Treffen.

homeworkHelpStudent.title: Homework help
homeworkHelpStudent.content:
With homework help, pupils get one-off, spontaneous, direct help with their homework. Do you think that sounds great? Then we'd love you to join us!
Just come to the preliminary meeting from Monday to Thursday at 15:50 and help pupils with their homework in your subjects for about 15 minutes each between 17:00 and 18:00. Drop by, we look forward to seeing you!

homeworkHelpPupil.title: Help with your homework
homeworkHelpPupil.content: Are you stuck with your homework? We can help you with your homework quickly and easily for 10 to 15 minutes from Monday to Thursday between 4pm and 5pm. We look forward to seeing you!

pupilScreening.title: We would like to get to know you!
pupilScreening.subtitle: Get to know
pupilScreening.content: Before we can find you a learning partner, we would like to get to know you. Please book a lecture for this purpose.

courseOffer.name: Offer a course
courseOffer.subtitle: Course name
courseOffer.description: We would be delighted if you would like to offer a course on our platform! In the help section, you will find our informative training and explanatory videos to help you get started. If you need support, you can book a consultation with our pedagogical team there. We are on hand to help you design your course and give you valuable tips. Your commitment means a lot to us - we can't wait to work with you to develop new courses and enrich the platform!

studentNewMatch.name: New learning support
studentNewMatch.subtitle: Tutoring
studentNewMatch.description: It was great to get to know you better and we are delighted that you would like to work with us to improve the educational opportunities of pupils . In order to assign you a suitable learning partner, we first ask you to submit a request on our platform. Here you can specify the subjects and grade level that are suitable for you. We look forward to getting started!

pupilNewMatch.name: New learning support
pupilNewMatch.subtitle: Tutoring
pupilNewMatch.description: In order for us to assign you the perfect learning partner, you must first submit a request on our platform. There you can easily specify the subjects that are important to you and in which we can help you. We look forward to getting started with you and beginning your learning journey together!

pupilFirstScreening.title: We would like to get to know you!
pupilFirstScreening.subtitle: Get to know
pupilFirstScreening.content: We would like to get to know you before you can use the services offered by Lern-Fair . Please book a lecture for a Zoom call.

shared.dissolvedAlert: Lernpaar wurde aufgelöst: Deine Zusammenarbeit mit {{partnerName}} wurde beendet.

blocker.title: Request support
blocker.ctaCardContent: Courses on various topics in the subjects German, math, English...
blocker.firstContent: We offer two types of tutoring: Daily, open homework help and 1:1 learning support. With 1:1 learning support, a person helps you free of charge in their free time with homework, exam preparation and anything else you want to discuss.

homeworkhelp.title: Homework help
homeworkhelp.textpupil: Every day from Monday - Thursday 17h - 18h we offer homework help on Zoom. You can participate every day if you need help with your homework.
homeworkhelp.texthelper: In the homework help service, you can help pupils spontaneously with their homework, just like in a consultation hour. Homework help takes place Monday - Thursday 17h - 18h. You can get involved as often as you like without obligation.
homeworkhelp.buttonSummerVacation: There will be no homework help until the end of the summer vacation on {{endSummerVacation}}

modal.title: Withdraw request
modal.description: Do you really want to delete the request? You will lose your place in the queue and we will give your place to another pupils .

pupil.description: Here you can say that you feel uncomfortable with {{firstName}}. We'll take care of it.

student.description: Here you have the opportunity to tell us about a problem with {{firstName}}. We will then get in touch with you to discuss the next steps.

report.success: Your message has been sent successfully

check.title: Learning support
check.content: In learning support, you help educationally disadvantaged pupils individually and one-to-one. You agree the time, duration and content of your digital meetings in your learning pair. You can form several learning pairs in parallel and we would be delighted if you could support another pupil within your time constraints. If you can no longer or no longer wish to continue learning support, you can dissolve the corresponding learning pair here.
check.areyousuretodelete: Do you really want to delete the request?
check.noMatches: You do not (yet) have a learning partner.
check.noDissolvedMatches: You have no resolved learning pairs.
check.editRequestDescription: If you change your details, your waiting time will not change. We will inform you by email as soon as it is your turn and we have found a suitable learning partner for you.
check.noRequestsTutee: We are not looking for a learning partner for you right now.
check.noRequestsTutor: We are not currently looking for a new/further learning partner for you. If you would like to be connected with a:r (further) pupil to support them, click on the 'Create learning pair' button.

daz.heading: German as a second language
daz.description: Can you imagine supporting pupils who speak German as a second language and have little knowledge of German?

profiledata.heading: Update profile
profiledata.text: So that we can assign you an optimal learning partner, we ask you to check and complete your personal information once again.

howlong.heading: When did you start learning German?
howlong.alertmsg: We are looking for someone to help you learn German.

subjects.heading: Subject selection
subjects.subheading: In which subjects do you need help?
subjects.reason_btn_disabled: Please select one or more subjects.
subjects.text: You can select a maximum of 1 subject.

priority.heading: Prioritization
priority.subheading: In which subject do you need the most help?
priority.text: We will try to find someone to help you in all subjects. Unfortunately, this is not always possible. You can therefore indicate here which subject is most important to you.

text.ver1: Next, we will invite you to an interview by email. Then we'll discuss everything else in person. - Why don't you drop by our group courses while you're here?
text.ver2: Your changes have been saved. This will not change your waiting time.

subjects.title: Subject selection
subjects.subtitle: In which subjects would you like to provide support?
subjects.reason_btn_disabled: Please select one or more subjects.

profile.title: Update profile
profile.subtitle: So that we can assign you an optimal learning partner, we ask you to check and complete your personal information once again.
profile.availabilityRequirement: Please set up your availability first to continue.

success.title: You've done it, you're a hero!
success.subtitle: Thank you for wanting to support a:n (more:n) pupil !
success.subtitle2: We are now looking for a:n suitable:n pupil for you. The search usually takes a maximum of one week. As soon as we have found someone for you, we will notify you directly by email. If you have any questions, you can contact us at any time.

grades.title: Grades
grades.question: In which year groups would you like to help?

tab1.title: My courses
tab1.content: Our recommendations are based on the information in your profile.

tab2.title: Recommendations
tab2.content: Our recommendations are based on the information in your profile.

tab3.title: All offers
tab3.content: Our recommendations are based on the information in your profile.

error.nofound: No courses were found. Please adjust your search.

pupil.title: Offers
pupil.content: On this page you will find your courses, recommendations for you and other offers. Looking for something special? Then use our search function.

alert.successfulEditing: Your course has been successfully completed.
alert.successfulCreation: Your course has been successfully created. If you have not released it for review immediately, please don't forget to do so. This is the only way we can publish your course in time.

helper.title: Group courses
helper.content: In our courses, you have the opportunity to help several pupils at once. We offer different course formats: Tutoring courses, focus courses and 'German for beginners'.

modal.title: Why do you want to dissolve the learning pair?

warningModal.title: Are you sure?
warningModal.studentDescription: Sometimes it takes a while for your counterpart to get back to you. We have held introductory meetings with all pupils and checked their need for tutoring. We therefore recommend that you wait at least 14 days for feedback before you dissolve the learning pair.
warningModal.pupilDescription: Sometimes it takes a while for volunteers to get back to you via chat, so we recommend waiting about 14 days. You can contact us at <0/> at any time.

newMatch.title: Form a new learning pair
newMatch.descriptionPupil: Would you like to be connected with a new learning partner? Please note that it will take some time before we can find someone for you.
newMatch.descriptionStudent: Would you like to be connected with a new learning partner? We would be delighted if you support (another) pupil . Thank you for your commitment!

student.ghosted: My learning partner did not get back to me
student.isOfNoHelp: I could not help my learning partner
student.noMoreTime: I no longer have time to support my learning partner
student.noMoreHelpNeeded: My learning partner no longer needs support
student.personalIssues: We had difficulties on an interpersonal level
student.scheduleIssues: We could not find a common lectures

pupil.ghosted: My learning partner did not get back to me
pupil.isOfNoHelp: My learning partner could not help me
pupil.noMoreTime: My learning partner no longer has time to support me
pupil.personalIssues: We had difficulties on an interpersonal level
pupil.scheduleIssues: We could not find a common lectures

certificate.title: Learning support from {{firstname}}
certificate.requestInstructions: {{firstname}} kann die Informationen in seinem:ihrem Userbereich anpassen.
certificate.areYou18: Are you of legal age (18 years or older)?
certificate.signInstructionsParents: On the following page, your parents must sign to confirm that {{firstname}} has supported you.
certificate.successInfo: Thank you for supporting us in recognizing the work of our volunteers .

adHocMeeting.title: Start meeting now
adHocMeeting.infoText: We will inform your:e pupil by email as soon as you start the meeting.

volunteering.title: Proof of honorary office
volunteering.text: You can have your activity confirmed at any time and then download the certificate.

createAppointmentModal.title: Would you like to create a lecture for this time slot?

availability.matchHasNotSetupPreferencesYet: {{learningPartnerName}} has not entered any time slots yet (send them a <chatLink>link</chatLink>)
availability.setupPreferencesChatMessage: Hi 👋, this is {{myName}}, maybe you would like to share your days when you have time with me. You can find it here: {{link}}
availability.title: Possible time slots

result.success: Your video call has been successfully added.
result.error: Your video call could not be entered.

modal.title: Start video call
modal.text: Enter the link to the video conference here

hint.pupil: You can only start the meeting 10 minutes before the start of a lecture
hint.student: You can start the meeting 4 hours before the start of the lecture.

cta.title: Onboarding tour Group courses
cta.content: If you are not yet sure whether the format of the tutoring courses really suits you, click through the onboarding for group tutoring and get a more precise idea of the activity.

student.title: The group courses
student.firstContent: You help an educationally disadvantaged student to close knowledge gaps in a group format. The frequency, frequency and duration of the digital meetings is entirely up to you!
student.secContent: You can find more information about our tutoring courses
student.content: You are currently not yet activated for the group courses, but scroll through the next process steps here to find out how to change this:

appointments.headline: When should the course take place?

error.course: Sorry, your course could not be created. Please try again.
error.subcourse: Sorry, your course could not be created. Please try again.
error.upload_image: Sorry, your image could not be uploaded.
error.set_image: Unfortunately, your image could not be set as a course image.
error.instructors: One or more instructors could not be added.
error.lectures: One or more lectures could not be added.
error.tags: Your tags could not be added.
error.isInPastOrInvalid: We could not find this course or it is in the past.

form.courseAlreadyaAddedLead: You have already added this person.
form.shortDescriptionPlaceholder: A short sentence about what your course is about ...
form.tagsPlaceholder: So that your course is easier to find
form.tagsInfo: The individual tags must be separated by a comma (,)
form.detailsContent: For which grades is the course suitable?
form.maxMembersInfo: Please indicate a higher number, as usually only half of the registered pupils appear.
form.otherOptionStart: pupils can register after the first course date
form.allowChatContact: Allow participants to write in the chat
form.prospectContactTooltip: pupils and volunteers who are interested in your course (before the course starts)
form.participantsContactTooltip: pupilswho have registered for your course
form.otherOptionStartToolTip: If you activate this option, pupils can register for your course at any time. In particular, you can also register if one or more lessons have already taken place.

Wizard.headline: Date
Wizard.dateInfo: A course must be created 7 days before the start of the course.

Preview.headline: Check details
Preview.content: Please check the details again before you publish your course.
Preview.startDateLabel: Join after the start of the course:

modal.headline: Done!
modal.content: Thank you, your course has been saved and sent to us. After checking and approving the content, your course will be activated and will be publicly visible. This will happen within the next 7 days.

unsplash.heading: Choose an image
unsplash.description: Search for a meaningful image for your course topic using the search bar. You cannot currently use your own images.

addCourseInstructor.notFound: No search results - Enter the full name or email of the instructor

empty.nocourses: You are not currently offering a course.
empty.noremissionordraft: You currently have no course draft and no course released for review.
empty.nopastcourses: You have not yet offered a course with us.

cancel.description: If you cancel the course, all lectures will be canceled and the participating pupils will be informed of this change by email. Are you sure you want to cancel the course?

course.noticeDate: Please fill in all fields correctly
course.cancelation_error: An error has occurred. The course could not be canceled.

leavePageModal.text: You are about to leave Lern-Fair
leavePageModal.description: You will be redirected to the following page

chat.title: Chat messages
chat.modalBody: We will send you an email for every chat message you receive.

survey.title: Feedback & surveys
survey.modalBody: We want you to be satisfied with Lern Fair. That's why we occasionally send you feedback questionnaires to hear about your experiences. We would be delighted if you would pass on feedback, ideas and suggestions for improvement to us in this way.

appointment.title: Date note
appointment.modalBody: We will inform you about new dates with your learning partners and in courses. We will also remind you of the lesson shortly before it starts.

advice.title: Learning tips & assistance
advice.modalBody: Learning must be learned. We help you prepare for your lessons with training courses and materials, while also sending you the best tips to maximize your learning progress. This will keep you motivated and save you valuable time.

suggestion.title: Course suggestions
suggestion.modalBody: We regularly upload exciting new courses to our platform. If a suitable course is offered for your year group and your subjects, you will receive a notification from us. You can change your subjects and therefore your interests in your profile at any time.

announcement.title: Important changes
announcement.modalBody: If the functionality of Lern-Fair changes significantly or there are new programs, we will inform you about important changes.

call.title: Call for engagement
call.modalBody: We will let you know if there is a particular need for support at any given time and explain how you can best campaign for more educational equality with us.

news.title: News from Lern-Fair
news.modalBody: We would like to inform you about new features and functions and draw your attention to benefits that you can receive via Lern-Fair .

event.title: Events
event.modalBody: At Lern-Fair , we regularly organize cool events and valuable training courses. We keep you up to date and connect you with other users on our platform.

request.title: Help needed
request.modalBody: For interviews, press articles or local campaigns, we are sometimes looking for volunteers and pupils who would like to take part in Lern-Fair and report on their experiences. We are also looking for test persons for our app, our website or a new program of ours.

alternative.title: Alternative offers
alternative.modalBody: Lern-Fair is a great support option for pupils. But there are also many other helpful programs, useful apps or social organizations. If we find something suitable for you, we will let you know and hope that you can benefit from the offer.

preference.enableAllTooltip: You have already activated all newsletters.
preference.disableAllTooltip: You have already deactivated all newsletters.
preference.pushNotificationTooltip: App notifications inform you about important events or information even when the app is not open. You can individually select which messages you would like to receive as app notifications.

pushNotificationsStatus.not-supported: Unfortunately, app notifications are not supported on this device
pushNotificationsStatus.user-denied: Unfortunately, we cannot send you any app messages as you have not given us permission to do so

system.title: System
system.description: System notifications are displayed within the app (on the bell in the header). Here you can set whether you would also like to be notified by email.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description:
Newsletters are only sent by email.
Here you can set which types of emails you would like to receive.

activateNotificationsModal.title: Note on new message
activateNotificationsModal.description: You can receive notifications about new messages in the chat or new appointments directly on your device ("push notification").

leftVideoChat.title: You have left the video chat
leftVideoChat.subtitle: We hope you enjoyed the course!

leftVideoChat.title: You have left the video chat
leftVideoChat.subtitle: We hope you enjoyed the 1:1 learning support!

report.modalMessage: Are you sure you want to report this message? We will review the message in the coming days and delete it if it violates our guidelines.

chat.title: Chat
chat.hint: You can only open the group chat once at least two pupils have registered for your course.
chat.noContactOptionsHint: Your learning pairs and group chats with which you can chat are listed here.

courseTypes.groupCourses: In our courses, you have the opportunity to help several pupils at once. We offer various course formats:
courseTypes.oneToOneLearningSupport: With Lern-Fair tutoring, we connect you with a:r pupil to form a learning pair. These pupils have a particular need for one-to-one help with school subjects.

modal.headline: New role
modal.desc: We are delighted that you are interested in continuing your involvement at Lern-Fair . As you have already had an introductory meeting with us, you know your way around. We will get back to you by email as soon as we have activated the additional role for you.

matchDescription.first: Together you determine topics and content
matchDescription.second: You determine the time of the tutoring
matchDescription.third: You meet once a week, over a period of time that you have decided together
matchDescription.fourth: Are you good at math, German or English? Great, because these tutors are urgently needed!

groupDescription.first: In the tutoring courses, you help pupils who want to improve in a specific school subject. Subjects from the main subjects (German, math, English) are particularly in demand. The courses usually take place weekly for a maximum of 12 weeks.
groupDescription.second: At "German for Beginners", you can help refugees pupils to learn German. We provide you with teaching materials so that you can design courses that focus on speaking and practising. The courses take place weekly.
groupDescription.third: In the focus courses, you can work on extracurricular topics with pupils . We organize various themed months throughout the year. The courses usually take place as individual appointments.

coaching.online: Lern-Fair offers you free online training courses from experts. If you do not yet have any experience in course management, we would like to ask you to take part. You can find current training dates on our website, please register here:
coaching.materials: In the help section you will find materials to help you prepare and run the courses:
coaching.one: Lists of typical school topics in the main subjects
coaching.two: Free license for the Sofatutor learning app

language.one: Lern-Fair offers you free online training courses from experts. If you do not yet have any experience in course management, we would like to ask you to take part. You can find current training dates on our website, please register here:
language.two: In the help section you will find materials to help you prepare and run the courses.

focus.one: As we structure the focus courses in themed months, we ask you to discuss the content of your topic with us before setting up your course. Please visit our website to find out about the planned focus months and contact us with your proposed topic at

banner.text: We will get back to you by email as soon as we have activated the additional role for you.

introduction.imageGroupText: Pass on your knowledge and lead group courses.
introduction.imageMatchText: With just 1-2 hours a week, you can give an educationally disadvantaged child the chance of a better future.
introduction.groupRequestedDescription: Thank you for your interest in offering a course. Before you can start your course, we have a few more tips for you:

search.placeholder: Name or email of a pupil or helper
search.not_found: Search for the full name or email of a pupil or helper

toast.shared: The course has been marked as a template
toast.unshared: The course has been marked as 'no longer available'

already.allowed: This course has already been approved
already.denied: This course has already been rejected

courses.are_you_sure_allow: Are you sure you want to activate this course?
courses.are_you_sure_deny: Are you sure you want to decline this course?

screening.title: Screening
screening.howto: Use the search bar to find the pupil or helper you want to screen.
screening.was_screened_but_no_decision: This pupil has already been screened, but a decision is still pending
screening.confirm_rejection: Do you really want to reject {{firstname}} {{lastname}}?
screening.confirm_deactivate: Do you really want to deactivate {{firstname}} {{lastname}}?
screening.no_open_screening_long: The student does not have an open screening where a case decision is pending.
screening.certificateOfConductWasProvided: Certificate of good conduct has been submitted
screening.certificateOfConductWasNotProvided: Certificate of good conduct has not yet been submitted

errors.language_missing: Please add at least one language.
errors.subjects_missing: Please add at least one subject.

screening.account_deactivated_details: The user can no longer log in to the user area. Support can reactivate accounts.

Completed.title: Collect your first success!
Completed.description: Complete achievements you have started to receive your rewards.

request.title: Apply for a certificate
request.subtitle: We would like to thank you for your commitment at Lern-Fair ! We will be happy to issue you with a certificate for your work.
request.subtitle2: A detailed Lern-Fair certificate consists of the following two parts:
request.procedure: You can apply for the certificate here and will receive a notification as soon as your commitment has been confirmed by your learning partner. From then on, you will also find the certificate in your profile.

request_page2.title: At which pupils would you like to apply for a certificate?

activities.title: Activity
activities.subtitle: Select the activities with which you supported your learning partners
activities.preparation: Preparation, planning and organization of lessons
activities.visualization_digital: Digital preparation and illustration of lesson content
activities.repetition: Consolidation and repetition of lesson content
activities.homework: Working on exercises and homework together

request_for_match.title: Details
request_for_match.subtitle: For each pupil, indicate the extent to which you have supported them.
request_for_match.not_a_number: You must enter a number here.

download.reasonBtnDisabled: Your:e pupil must still confirm your certificate.
download.error: An error occurred during the download

certificateOfConduct.description: The protection of children and young people is very important to us, which is why we require an extended certificate of good conduct from all volunteers within eight weeks of the introductory meeting. In order to keep your account active, we ask you to apply for the extended certificate of good conduct promptly and submit it to us by the deadline. You can use the certificate to apply for the extended certificate of good conduct free of charge.
certificateOfConduct.tooltip:
After this date, your account with us will be automatically deactivated. 
If you need more time to apply, please send us an email to support@lern-fair.de.
certificateOfConduct.alert_message: Please note: Applying for an extended certificate of good conduct can take several weeks in some cases!
certificateOfConduct.reason_download_disabled: Please wait a moment, the download should start soon.
certificateOfConduct.request_header: How do I apply for an extended certificate of good conduct?

issueReporter.title: An error has occurred
issueReporter.subtitle: Sorry, this should not happen. The tech team has been informed and is taking care of the error. If you have any questions, please contact support

set_password.title: Reset password
set_password.error: An error has occurred. Please try again.
set_password.success_subtitle: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now log in with the new password
set_password.failure_subtitle: Sorry, your password could not be changed. Please try again. If the error persists, please send a new email or contact support.

reasonsDisabled.invalidEMail: Please enter a valid email address.
reasonsDisabled.formIncomplete: You must fill in all fields.

noScreening.title: Welcome, {{firstname}}! 👋 We'll get to know each other soon 🤗
noScreening.content:
So that we can put you, {{firstname}}, in touch with a suitable helper now, we would like to have a 15-minute video call with you. The call will be conducted in German.
 You can choose an appointment in the calendar and will receive an email to {{email}} after the appointment has been confirmed. You can change or cancel the appointment at any time. - During the call, we will talk about your current challenges and explain Lern-Fair to you. You can come alone or with your parents. Don't worry if your German is not good, we can still have the call. If you don't want to make a video call under any circumstances, please get in touch and we will find another solution.
noScreening.footer: Don't have the confidence? Don't speak German? Or do you have other questions? Then get in touch with us

hasScreening.title: Please wait a bit
hasScreening.content: We were very pleased to meet you. Your account has not yet been activated. We will inform you by email as soon as we have made a decision.

rejectedScreening.title: Unfortunately, we can't help you, {{firstname}}
rejectedScreening.content: Unfortunately, we have decided that we cannot make the Lern-Fair offer available to you. Please contact us if you have any questions about the decision.

noScreening.title: Please book a lecture, {{firstname}}!
noScreening.content: Before you can start working at Lern-Fair , we would like to get to know you in a short interview. Please book a lecture for a Zoom call.

rejectedScreening.title: Unfortunately, it didn't fit
rejectedScreening.content: Unfortunately, we have decided that the commitment at Lern-Fair does not suit you. Contact us if you have any questions about the decision.

appointment.joinMeetingHint: You can only start the meeting 5 minutes before the start of the appointment.
appointment.title: Appointment created ✅
appointment.optionsDescription: You don't have time and want to postpone or cancel the appointment?
appointment.description: You will receive an appointment confirmation to your email address. You can add the appointment to your calendar with a click.

contactSupport.title: Contact support
contactSupport.content: Do you have any questions or need help? Write to us using the contact form and we will be happy to help you.
contactSupport.success: Your message has been sent successfully
contactSupport.legal: Ich bin damit einverstanden, dass Lern-Fair die hier gemachten Angaben entsprechend meines Anliegens verarbeitet und nehme die Übermittlung an unsere Dienstleister in die USA und die <privacy>Datenschutzerklärung</privacy> zur Kenntnis.

forStudents.title: For volunteers
forStudents.description: Here you can find all our help & offers for volunteers.

forPupils.title: For pupils
forPupils.description: Here you can find all our help & offers for pupils.

modal.title: Feedback on the user app
modal.description: What can we do better in the app? What feature are you missing? Is something broken?
modal.canWeContactPerMailLabel: May we contact you by email?
modal.canWeContactPerMailHelperText: To better understand problems / ideas. We only do this when necessary.

appFeedback.screenshotShouldNotBeBiggerThan: The screenshot cannot be larger than {{size}} MB

installation.installDescription: For faster access to chats and lectures without logging in

list: The app loads faster, saves data and sends notifications directly to your device. This means you never miss a chat or lecture - and you no longer have to log in every time.
You can install the app on different devices so that both parents and pupils have access to the chat and appointment reminders.
pros.title: Advantages

list: The app can be installed directly from this browser without the App Store.
The following browsers are supported: Android (Chrome), iOS (Safari), Windows (Chrome, Edge) and macOS (Chrome).
Click on the "Install app" button and follow the instructions.
installationDetails.title: Installation

page.title: The Lern-Fair app
page.description: Download the Lern-Fair app on all your devices to access chats and lectures at any time.
page.not-supported: Unfortunately, the installation of the app on this device is not supported.

steps.first: Click on <0/> at the top or bottom of the browser

sessionManager.title: Manage devices
sessionManager.description: Here you can see all the devices that are connected to your account. You can remove devices that you no longer use.

lesson.generatePlanText: Create a lesson plan to teach your students.
lesson.subject: Subject:
lesson.placeholderDescription: Describe your lesson with more context for the AI
lesson.acceptTCText: I have not entered any personal data in the text field and I am aware that Open AI may use it without European data protection standards. Should anyone assert claims against Lern-Fair because I have no rights to the uploaded documents, I undertake to indemnify Lern-Fair .
lesson.fileUploadTooltip: Improve the AI output by uploading additional files here
lesson.placeholderImageDescription: Fill out the form to create a lesson plan

bullets: does not list individual learning partners
The type of support, total duration and number of lessons are listed
instantCertificate.title: Immediate certificate

bullets: must be confirmed by the learning partner
The time spent can also be confirmed here
participationCertificate.title: Individual certificate

materials.title: Display flyers & posters
materials.description: For example, you can display flyers or put up posters - at school, the youth center, the library or in stores. Receive flyers, posters and other advertising material free of charge to your home.

reward.title: My contribution
reward.description: If you use your personal link, you can follow your contribution here.
reward.tooltip: To unlock this info, 3 or more users must have registered

referral.title: Help us to grow
referral.description: Many come to us through recommendations. Help us to make Lern-Fair better known! You can send us a referral link or use posters and flyers.
referral.referralMessage: I volunteer at Lern-Fair, where educationally disadvantaged pupils (grades 1 to 13 & trainees) receive free tutoring - digital & flexible via Zoom #educational equity #volunteering
